__e: My mom Margaret won't shut up about you.
You know I only want what's best for you, Margaret, don't you?
I mean, Margaret hasn't left me, Although... what she does with her time...
/ I'm afraid it's not for Miss Margaret.
The way David looks at Mary Margaret, that's what I want for me.
Margaret is the only daughter of an only son of an only son.
You told me you could help me with Mary Margaret, and I wanted to believe you.
I'm so sorry, Margaret, and I'm sorry for everything I did, every ugly word I said about Hank.
It's my life, Margaret! And I want it back!
Apart from Margaret, you're the only person I've ever enjoyed talking to.
Oh, don't worry, Margaret, you'll get what's coming to you.
Margaret, you're a fine woman, but I can't leave my country.
Margaret, I want to say how sorry I am about what happened at the school.
Margarita, I want you to listen attentively to what I say; it is very important.
She's too sweet a kid, and besides that... I can't go on like this without her knowing something about Margaret... and I haven't got the nerve to come out and tell her, that's all.
